env.name: TZ
env.label: TZ
env.description: Specify a timezone to use for example America/New_York

env.name: OOKLA_EULA_GDPR
env.label: OOKLA_EULA_GDPR
env.description: Set to 'true' to accept the Ookla EULA and privacy agreement. If this is not set, the container will not start

env.name: AUTH
env.label: AUTH
env.description: Optional. Set to 'true' to enable authentication for the app

description: Run a Speedtest every hour and graph the results.
name: speedtest-tracker
title: Speedtest Tracker
